adjective.description: Denoting or relating to a period of a thousand years.
examples: the current increase in hurricanes is only a small fluctuation within this longer millennial cycle

adjective.description: Denoting people reaching young adulthood in the early 21st century.
examples: most social networking groups are dominated by the millennial generation

noun.description: A person reaching young adulthood in the early 21st century.
examples: the industry brims with theories on what makes millennials tick
another distinguishing feature of Millennials is that they come to college from a lifestyle that was highly scheduled
